title: Check Drawing Against Company Standard
description: A junior designer has completed a new drawing. A senior designer must check it to ensure it complies with the company's drafting standards.

tasks.description: Retrieve the new drawing and the company's official drafting standard document.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent pulls up both documents for comparison.

tasks.description: Review the drawing for compliance with standards for layering, text styles, and dimensioning.
tasks.expected_outcome: The senior designer finds that the layering is incorrect.

tasks.description: Return the drawing to the junior designer with comments on what needs to be corrected.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent rejects the drawing in the workflow, providing specific feedback for correction.
